name: Fight for the Road
description:
Based on Road Fighter (NES)

Fight for the Road was created and programmed by Antuán Kerbage for quCat Games.
Special thanks to opengameart.org and freesound.org and their users for the assets for the game.

Controllers:
- Space to accept
- Left and right to move
- Up to accelerate
Objetive:
Arrive on time and win!
- Take the fuel to reach the finish line before the time runs out
- Take the boost to increase the speed
- Be careful with the different types of car and oil thrown on the road
